pullrequest.title: qtutils 2.0.0 support and experimental PyQt5 support

content.raw: There is a problem that only appears with PyQt5 - the loading of the green button theme doesn't seem to be working. If you go into the settings menu and click ok on the theme tab, then it applies it just fine - but not at startup. I'm not sure why, since it's the same code running in both cases. I'll look into it at some point.
content.html: There is a problem that only appears with PyQt5 - the loading of the green button theme doesn't seem to be working. If you go into the settings menu and click ok on the theme tab, then it applies it just fine - but not at startup. I'm not sure why, since it's the same code running in both cases. I'll look into it at some point.
